description_expanded: Air Wick Vibrant Wild Strawberry & Poppy Plug-In Refills (5ct) is designed to deliver everyday reliability with thoughtful details suited for home fragrance. A 5-count package of scented oil refills for Air Wick Plug-In warmers in the vibrant Wild Strawberry and Poppy scent. Built for convenience and value, it balances quality materials with practical features you can rely on at home, on the go, or as a thoughtful gift.
